Subject: Reminder: WCCI 2008 Car racing competition
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=206967455; y=QtraveX2M0F0TZ2VWlLFGh33LkGGS7NGQ5Y_QgoZsYS7
X-Yahoo-Profile: jtogel

I'd like to encourage you all to consider participating in the WCCI
car racing competition, which is about learning controllers for racing
cars. In last year's competition, which used a simpler racing game,
controllers based on NEAT scored well but were overtaken by other
controllers based on e.g. genetic programming and fuzzy logic. This
year we're using a more complex racing game, and learning a really
well-performing controller will likely prove to be quite challenging;
still, we've worked hard to make it as easy as possible to enter the
competition.

http://cig.dei.polimi.it/?page_id=5

We've been off to a slow start this year thanks to an unexpected
number of technical problems, but with some assistance from Matt
Simmerson all the bugs seem to have been squashed in the current
release of the competition software.

Julian
